name: Coulson Rigidbody Simulator
description:
Have fun with simulated Coulson rigidbodys, or crash your computer to the point of no return!

Fields:

Spawn Amm - How many rigidbodys to spawn

Buttons:

Spawn - Spawn selected amount of rigidbodys.

Clear - Clear all spawned rigidbodys.

Cover image by @faxefmachine
